title: EUR/USD: Buying Opportunity At 1.1010/00
text:
EUR/USD And USD/CAD Spot Daily Forecast - October 17, 2019

EURUSD & USDCAD Spot Chart

longs at 1.1010/00 work perfectly as we hit 1.1050/60 and 1.1075/85, perhaps as far as 1.1110/20 today. Exit any remaining longs and try shorts with stops above 1.1140.

Minor support at 1.1040/35 then a buying opportunity at 1.1010/00 with stops below 1.0980. An unexpected break below here kills the buy signal targeting 1.0950/40 and 1.0905/00 before the swing low at 1.0883/77.

first resistance at 1.3205/10, second resistance at 1.3230/40 but a break higher today meets a selling opportunity at 1.3260/70, with stops above 1.3285.

Minor support at last week's low at 1.3166. A break lower retests the September low at 1.3133/29 and below here targets 1.3105/00.
description: Forex Analysis by Jason Sen covering: EUR/USD, USD/CAD. Read Jason Sen's latest article on Investing.com
